verses.roman:
aiche śāstra kahe,--karma, jñāna, yoga tyaji'
'bhaktye' kṛṣṇa vaśa haya, bhaktye tāṅre bhaji

synonyms: aiche—in that way; śāstra kahe—Vedic literatures confirm; karma—fruitive activities; jñāna—speculative knowledge; yoga—the mystic yoga system; tyaji'-giving up; bhaktye—by devotional service; kṛṣṇa—the Supreme Absolute Personality of Godhead; vaśa haya—becomes satisfied; bhaktye—by devotional service; tāṅre—Him; bhaji—we worship.
translation: "Revealed scriptures conclude that one should give up fruitive activity, speculative knowledge and the mystic yoga system and instead take to devotional service, by which Kṛṣṇa can be fully satisfied.
